content:
KAOHSIUNG HARBOUR BUREAU KAOHSIUNG. TAIWAN. CHINA
April 25, 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei,
Subject: Excess Equipment
Pro ject No.84-99-471
Dear Mr. Chang:
With reference to White Engineering letter dated April 23, 1962, File Ref. MSA-33.4, we learned that TPC had declared re- allocation of five (5) Gray Marine Diesel Engine.
This Bureau has a plan to get such engine for the replace- 1.40 1.12.21.3.82 ment of semi-diesel boat engines which have been proved insatis- factory, and White Engineering letter to CUSA dated Oct. 2, 1961 recommended to procure such engine for this Bureau.
If possible, please re-allocate all these five (5) Gray Marine Diesel Engine to KaHB.
tt 光
Very truly yours,
{ 2 AZ 4
7:
P. c. Hon
P. C. Hou Capt. RCN Coordinator, for Excess Equipment Ka.HB
9
7/
cc: GEOtto, White Eng. JHKeatley, White Eng.

paragraphs.content: KAOHSIUNG HARBOUR BUREAU KAOHSIUNG. TAIWAN. CHINA
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei,
With reference to White Engineering letter dated April 23, 1962, File Ref. MSA-33.4, we learned that TPC had declared re- allocation of five (5) Gray Marine Diesel Engine.

This Bureau has a plan to get such engine for the replace- 1.40 1.12.21.3.82 ment of semi-diesel boat engines which have been proved insatis- factory, and White Engineering letter to CUSA dated Oct. 2, 1961 recommended to procure such engine for this Bureau.
If possible, please re-allocate all these five (5) Gray Marine Diesel Engine to KaHB.
P. C. Hou Capt. RCN Coordinator, for Excess Equipment Ka.HB
cc: GEOtto, White Eng. JHKeatley, White Eng.
